Date: 2024-12-11 13:10
Subject: Chalhoub Group - Frostys Peaceful Village
--------------------------------------------------
Join us together with your little ones at the Chalhoub Group - Frosty's Peaceful Village 2024

December 14, 2024
4:00 - 7:00 PM
Madinat Arena at Madinat Jumeirah

Limited Parking available at the venue, we recommend carpooling or taking a Taxi.

Event is by invitation only for Chalhoub Group employees, their spouses and their children (from 0 to 10 years old); The QR code gives access to 2 Adults only.

The QR CODE is individual by family (not to be shared) and can only be scanned once; Make sure to present a copy of your chalhoub ID along with the QR code at the entrance.
